name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward E. SCHOFIELD, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward E. SCHOFIELD, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2012 the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
The Application for Bail Pending Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
51 A.3d 180
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Edward E. SCHOFIELD, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2012.
